scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:types && bun run build:js
scripts.build:js: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/ts-flattered.js --external typescript --target bun --format esm --minify
scripts.dev: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/ts-flattered.js --watch --external typescript --target bun --format esm
scripts.release: npm version patch && bun run build && git add . && git commit -m 'chore(release): release new version' && git push && git push --tags
